sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react";
import { Card, Col, Container, Form, Row, Button } from "react-bootstrap";

const objnew ={
  pk:null,
  nombre:"",
  ci:""
}

const FormChoferes = ({dataToEdit, create ,update}) => {
  const[form ,setForm] = useState({})
  
 const handleChange =(e)=>{
    const {name , value} = e.target
    setForm({
      ...form,
      [name]:value
    })
 }

  return (
    <>
      <Container>
        <Form>
          <Row>
            <Col className="px-1 col col-md-12">
              <Form.Group>
                <label htmlFor="nombre del Chofer">Nombre del Chofer</label>
                <Form.Control
                  defaultValue="Lexys Manuel."
                  placeholder="Nombre del Chofer."
                  type="text"
                ></Form.Control>
              </Form.Group>
            </Col>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Col className="px-1 col col-md-12">
              <Form.Group>
                <label htmlFor="nombre del Chofer">CI del Chofer</label>
                <Form.Control
                  defaultValue="Lexys Manuel."
                  placeholder="Nombre del Chofer."
                  type="text"
                ></Form.Control>
              </Form.Group>
            </Col>
          </Row>
          <Button
            style={{ marginLeft: "300px" }}
            className="btn-fill pull-right"
            type="submit"
            variant="info"
          >
            Acceptar
          </Button>
        </Form>
      </Container>
    </>
  );
};

export default FormChoferes;
